name: VIVOHOME Projector Screen Pull Down, 16:9 100 Inch Retractable Projection Screen, HD 4K Manual Pull Movie Screen for Home Theater, Cinema, Office (87x49 Inch Black)
short_description: IMPORTANT: For installation, the projector screen measures around 92 x 59 inches (W x H) in total, with a white display area of around 87 x 49 inches (W x H) and a 16:9 aspect ratio. For the best viewing experience, position the screen 8-10 feet away from the seating area (this may vary depending on your setup and preferences)

PREMIUM MATERIALS: Metal-made screen casing better reduces the risk of deformation and damage whether in transportation or use; White plastic material with a three-layer composite structure makes the screen surface smooth and flat; The three-layer fiber structure does not expand and contract due to external temperature and humidity changes, which effectively prevents the screen from wrinkling and deforming

MANUAL SELF-LOCKING POSITION SYSTEM: The innovative design of the manual screen's self-locking torsion spring can accurately detect the subtle movements that occur as the screen opens and closes; This allows the screen to be locked at the specified position promptly, reducing pullback rebound and inaccurate positioning; The screen shaft uses high-purity lubricating oil, and the rotating structure is sealed dust-proof and highly durable

NEW VISUAL FEAST: The unique properties of white plastic materials ensure that each incident light is reflected uniformly; A panoramic viewing angle of up to 160° and a 16: 9 wide-screen view allow you and your family to enjoy a private and customized IMAX movie screen; The screen supports 3D, 1080P, 4K, and Full HD images; The surface of the screen is embossed with a matte coating, which effectively improves picture brightness and resists the interference of ambient light

ATTENTION TO DETAILS: We grasp every detail needed for your screen; The edges of the screen are created by a special process that will not curl or warp over time; The white plastic material is mildew and moisture-proof, which can be scrubbed, and is easy to maintain; To facilitate your use, we have provided you with two methods of installation: wall and ceiling mounting make it easy to set up in any home NOTE: Screws and hooks are not included

WIDELY USED: This portable projection screen is suitable for a variety of scenarios; Whether it is a workplace office, teaching training, or used as entertainment equipment, such as watching movies, home theater, playing games, karaoke, etc., it's definitely your best choice

name: Silver Ticket Products STR Series 6 Piece White 1.1 Gain 120" Diagonal 16:9 Format Projection Screen, Aluminum Frame, Wall Mounted, 109.25x63.625 inches STR-169120
short_description: Wall Mounted Fixed Frame Projection Screen (Overall Size 63.625" Tall x 109.25" Wide) (Viewing Area 120" Diagonal x 58.875" Tall x 104.5" Wide) No option for Legs or Stands with this product. Recommended for projectors with Native 16:9 Resolution

1.1 Gain White screen surface with an exceptionally wide viewing angle at 160 degrees with no resolution loss at any viewing angle. Works great with Long, Short and Ultra Short Throw projectors. The standard white material is not acoustically transparent.

2 3/8" heavy duty beveled aluminum frame wrapped in light-absorbing black velvet material for a beautifully crisp viewing image; Enjoy beautiful movies, pictures, and games in FULL HD, 4K / 8K and Active 3D

Quick and easy assembly with tensioning rod system ensures that you can bring cinema-quality entertainment to your home in just a few minutes. Secure top and bottom mounting brackets that allow horizontal adjustment
Before purchasing, project an image on wall to determine the size works for the projector and watch the step by step instructional video listed.
Some UST projectors are not compatible with the STR frame. If using a UST projector it is recommended to purchase the S7 frame series
product_description: The Silver Ticket Products Fixed Frame projection screen offers powerful performance for the price. This screen features real projection screen material, not a sheet. The material is a white stretchy, high-quality vinyl at 1.1 gain that is designed for watching movies. Wait until you see the colors! There is no resolution lost at any angle. This screen truly assembles much faster than any other brand available! Forget about tucking the screen material into the frame - the Silver Ticket Tension Rod System saves you time and frustration. How does the material connect to the frame? Each side of the material has a pocket. A rod slides through the pocket to attach to the frame. This saves you time during assembly, but also removes any puckers or wrinkles in the viewing surface. The rod holds the material perfectly square all around the whole frame. This pocket and rod system remains hidden behind the frame so you only see the movie. Forget about tricky installations - this fixed frame screen mounts on the wall much like a large picture frame. The sturdy aluminum frame is WRAPPED, not flocked, with a light absorbing black velvet fabric to absorb over-projected light so you don't have to be a professional when aligning your projector. While other brands use square tubing in their frames, this screen is built with durable extruded aluminum that contours down to the projected image so you won't have any ugly shadow on the image area. Join the thousands of satisfied customers -- buy Silver Ticket today!

name: 100 inch Projector Screen, 16:9 Foldable Anti-Crease Portable Projector Movies Screens for Home Theater, Outdoor Indoor Support Double Sided Projection
short_description: [ 4K Ultra HD High-Gain Projector Screen ] - Capture and reflect light more efficiently—images stay bright and clear even in natural daylight. Say goodbye to washed-out colors, blurry visuals, and hard-to-read subtitles.

[ Wrinkle-Free Material ] - Built with high-density anti-wrinkle fabric that resists creases and distortion. Keeps the screen smooth without constant adjustment, ensuring seamless, immersive projection.

[ 4K-Ready Surface for Sharp Detail ] - Smooth screen texture minimizes light diffusion, delivering crisp and stable visuals. Ideal for home entertainment or professional use—experience every detail as intended.
[ Foldable & Portable Design ] - Easily folds for storage or travel without adding bulk. No more worrying about space or transport—perfect for on-the-go movie nights or outdoor setups.
[ Multi-Scene Compatibility ] - Designed for home, office, outdoor, and gaming use. Works with both permanent setups and temporary ones—enjoy a consistent big-screen experience anywhere.
[ Easy Set up, No Tools Required ] - No drilling or wall damage. Even first-time users can install it in minutes—perfect for renters or frequent movers.
[ 160° Wide Viewing Angle ] - Enjoy a clear view from any position with our 160° viewing angle. Great for group watching—everyone gets the best seat in the house.
[ Easy to Clean & Durable ] - Save time and effort—resistant to dust, rain, and stains. Simply wipe clean for a spotless surface. Built to last indoors and outdoors, for hassle-free durability.
[ Flat Edges, True Format Display ] - No curling corners, no warped visuals. Reinforced edges keep the screen perfectly flat for distortion-free projection and true-to-scale visuals.
[ Reliable After-Sales Service ] - HAPPRUN provides 24/7 customer support, a 30-day money-back guarantee and lifetime technical support to ensure complete customer satisfaction
